snippet: The Taliban re-emerged three years after the American-led 2001 invasion during which repeated efforts to bring them to the negotiating table have faltered.
lead_paragraph: The Taliban re-emerged three years after the American-led 2001 invasion during which repeated efforts to bring them to the negotiating table have faltered.

headline.seo: Landmark on Twisting Path Toward Talks With the Taliban
headline.main: Landmark on Twisting Path Toward Talks
headline.print_headline: Landmark on Twisting Path Toward Talks
